abstract: Completion of Verizon's $4.4 billion acquisition of AOL paves way for new mobile-first video service; available across different wireless providers, service will offer content that includes sports, on-demand programming and youth-focused AwesomenessTV.
lead_paragraph: The completion of the deal paves the way for the start of Verizon’s mobile-first video service.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Verizon Completes $4.4 Billion AOL Deal

snippet: The completion of the deal paves the way for the start of Verizon’s mobile-first video service.
